articles.title: Neue Alchemy Launches AU79 Records in Under 24 Hours
articles.author: Neue Alchemy
articles.summary: Neue Alchemy has launched AU79 Records, a new micro-label designed to move at the speed of culture. This launch occurred during a coast-to-coast sprint from New York to Chicago.

articles.title: 28 Affordable Personal Care Items That Actually Work
articles.author: Celia Funderburk
articles.summary: Several new beauty and personal care products are launching, including Gold Bond Friction Defense stick for chafing, O'Keeffe's Working Hands hand cream for dry hands, and Bio-Oil for scar appearance improvement. Other new products include a rosemary mint hair-strengthening oil, an oil-absorbing face roller, a Briotech spray for irritated skin, and Truremedy Naturals Remedy Tea Tree Oil body wash.

articles.title: MTN Ghana Launches DigiFest 2025: A Month of Digital Innovation and Opportunity
articles.author: Ameyaw Debrah
articles.summary: MTN Ghana launched DigiFest 2025, a month-long festival showcasing their digital product suite, including the myMTN app. The festival features demonstrations of digital concepts and products from partners like Samsung and Huawei, reinforcing MTN's commitment to digital innovation and customer engagement.

articles.title: Victoria's Secret Trying Best Not To Be Next Cracker Barrel
articles.author: Natalie Sandoval
articles.summary: Victoria's Secret is emphasizing its brand as 'unapologetically sexy' with a new 'Very Sexy' campaign, moving away from its previous distancing from lingerie-clad models. The company aims to serve its customers more holistically while considering what defines a modern Angel for the brand.

articles.title: Seven things we like about the Omoda 9
articles.author: Andrew Maclean
articles.summary: Chery's luxury sister brand is introducing the Omoda 9, a new car model. This vehicle offers a luxurious experience at an affordable price point, combining powerful performance with efficient fuel consumption. The Omoda 9 also provides an electric vehicle-like experience for short drives without the range limitations of a fully electric car.

articles.title: Extuitive raises US$20M seed to make AI ads for Shopify brands
articles.author: Murad Hemmadi
articles.summary: Extuitive, a startup, is planning to expand its services beyond AI ads. The company will introduce software designed to generate and test new product ideas and designs, building upon its existing technology that uses client data from Shopify stores to create targeted ads.

articles.title: Beauty on TApp Cements Itself As A Premium Beauty Retailer
articles.summary: Beauty on TApp celebrated its 10th anniversary by launching a new flagship store in Sandton City, Gauteng. This new store introduces skin diagnostics technology operated by in-store aestheticians and offers globally sought-after products like Medicube and COSRX, as well as basins for product testing.

articles.title: Hark, the Advents Calendars Are Here
articles.author: Ambar Pardilla
articles.summary: Several companies are launching new Advent calendars for 2023. Magna-Tiles is releasing a holiday-themed train calendar, while Sephora and Liberty London offer beauty calendars with full-size products. Bloomingdale's features a fragrance calendar, Macy's includes skincare and haircare, and Jo Malone offers a calendar with original scents. Other calendars include Charlotte Tilbury's Beauty Treasure Chest, Beekman 1802's winter village calendar, Voluspa's candle calendar, Fly by Jing's spicy calendar, Fortnum & Mason's tea calendar, Williams Sonoma's seasoning calendar, LEGO's city calendar, and American Girl's doll baking calendar.

articles.title: The Levi's 501 Jeans Mega-Test: I Tried On 18 Different Pairs to Find the Best Ones
articles.author: Leon Hedgepeth
articles.summary: Levi's launched the 501 jeans in 1890, which has undergone many alterations over the decades. Currently, Levi's offers around 40 variations of the 501, including vintage reproductions and slim tapers. A wear-test was conducted to evaluate the different fits of the jeans, focusing on fit rather than wash variations.

articles.title: The Best Scalp Care Products for Healthier Hair
articles.author: Michael Stefanov
articles.summary: R+Co Bleu launched a scalp therapy exfoliating scrub with sugar crystals and AHAs. Oribe introduced Serene Scalp Densifying Treatment Spray with niacinamide and pea sprout extract. Patricks released SF1 Sea Salt Foam with hyaluronic acid and vegan keratin. Nutrafol launched Build-Up Blocker Exfoliating Scalp Mask powered by AHAs, enzymes, and prebiotics.

articles.title: Doritos Collisions Stranger Pizza X Cool Ranch Review: Retro Looks, Familiar Flavors
articles.author: Michael Palan
articles.summary: Doritos, in collaboration with Netflix's 'Stranger Things', is releasing a new flavor: 'Doritos Collisions Stranger Pizza x Cool Ranch'. This limited-time offering combines the new Stranger Pizza flavor with the classic Cool Ranch. Additionally, Doritos is updating the packaging of its Nacho Cheese, Cool Ranch, and Sweet & Tangy BBQ flavors with 'Stranger Things' branding, and Doritos Minis Spicy Sweet Chili canisters will glow in the dark.

articles.title: Just 39 Things That Come Highly Recommended From Reviewers
articles.author: Rebecca O'Connell
articles.summary: Eos is launching its Cashmere Skin Collection Shave Oil, featuring the whipped vanilla, musk, and soft caramel scent. Juno & Co. introduces its Clean 10 Cleansing Balm which uses pearl barley and vitamin E for makeup removal.

articles.title: Sprouts Farmers Market Opens First Location in St. Petersburg, Setting Official Opening Date
articles.author: Omar El Sayed
articles.summary: Sprouts Farmers Market is opening a new location in St. Petersburg, Florida, on October 26, 2025. The grand opening will include a ribbon-cutting ceremony, free samples, live music, special promotions, and potential giveaways. The new store offers fresh produce, bulk bins, vitamins and supplements, and other grocery items.

articles.title: What-A-Bargain Grocery set to open Sunday
articles.author: Stan Hudy
articles.summary: What-A-Bargain Grocery is opening a new grocery store in Amsterdam, offering recognizable national brands at bargain prices. The store will carry a variety of products including cereal, tortillas, bread, milk, eggs, diapers, wipes, and frozen food.

articles.title: Walmart outlines major changes to online shopping
articles.author: Leada Gore
articles.summary: Walmart has launched an upgraded Walmart Translation Platform (WTP) that provides real-time translation for 44 languages, enhancing the online shopping experience. The AI-powered platform adapts to various dialects and understands user intent, leading to better search results and cost savings for Walmart. The WTP enables conversations in both text-to-text and speech-to-speech formats.

articles.title: Guide to Virtual Phone Number for Online Verification 2025
articles.summary: SMS-MAN provides virtual phone numbers for online verification across 180 countries, offering low-cost private rentals and API access. The platform supports various applications like Google, Facebook, WhatsApp, and Telegram, aiming to provide a balance in cost, reliability, and scalability for startups, agencies, and advanced users.

articles.title: 9 Small Coffee Machines That Actually Fit Your Worktop
articles.author: Alex Harrington
articles.summary: Nespresso presents the Essenza Mini and Vertuo Pop, compact coffee machines designed for fast and tidy espresso. Dolce Gusto offers the Piccolo XS, a budget-friendly and versatile machine ideal for small spaces. Lavazza introduces the A Modo Mio Tiny Eco, an espresso machine made with recycled plastic. De'Longhi features the Dedica EC685 and Magnifica S, a slimline manual espresso machine and an all-in-one bean-to-cup machine respectively. Sage offers the Bambino, designed for excellent milk texturing. Melitta presents the Caffeo Solo, a narrow bean-to-cup machine, and the Aromaboy, a 1-2 cup filter coffee maker perfect for small spaces.

articles.title: The AirPods Pro 3 Are Pretty Damn Cool
articles.author: Krista Jones
articles.summary: Apple has launched the AirPods Pro 3, featuring updates such as Live Translation, which translates languages in real-time, and Heart Rate Sensing for fitness tracking during workouts. The Live Translation feature is still in Beta and undergoing fine-tuning to improve accuracy and reduce delays, while the Heart Rate Sensor integrates with the Apple Fitness app to provide detailed workout metrics.

articles.title: 10 Best-Smelling Body Scrubs for Silky, Divinely Scented Skin
articles.author: Jenny Berg
articles.summary: Ouai launched Scalp & Body Scrub with sugar crystals and coconut oil. Origins launched GinZing Refreshing Scrub Cleanser with ginseng-caffeine blend, jojoba beads and carnauba wax. Dedcool launched Body Scrub Xtra Milk with rice powder and kakadu plum. Nécessaire launched The Body Exfoliator Eucalyptus with volcanic pumice, salicylic acid, and glycolic acid. Dove launched Crushed Cherries & Chia Milk Body Scrub with hydrated silica. Kai launched Body Buffer with hypoallergenic sponges. Josie Maran launched Sugar and Argan Oil Body Scrub in Topless Tangerine with sugar. Sidia launched Wired The Body Exfoliant with rice exfoliant. Sol de Janeiro launched Bum Bum Body Scrub with crushed capuaçu seeds, guaraná extract and coconut oil. Pattern launched Dry Exfoliating Scrub with epsom salt and Dead Sea salt extracts.

articles.title: Nickelodeon Splat Pack Announced for PS5, Xbox Series X
articles.author: William D'Angelo
articles.summary: Limited Run Games has announced the Nickelodeon Splat Pack, a collection of classic games including Aaahh!!! Real Monsters, Nickelodeon G.U.T.S, and Rocko's Modern Life: Spunky's Dangerous Day. The collection is available for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, and PC and comes in Standard, Classic, and Collector's Editions with varying content and pricing.

articles.title: Boden is selling the 'Christmas party dress of dreams' for 2025 and it's already reduced
articles.author: Shawna Healey
articles.summary: Boden is selling the new Lucille Tulle Midi Dress, described as the 'Christmas party dress of dreams', for the upcoming 2025 festive season. The dress is available with a 15% discount using the code MY7P, reducing the price from £149 to £126.65.

articles.title: My favorite product releases this week: Soundpeats, Narwal, Tupperware and more
articles.author: Rikka Altland
articles.summary: Several product launches occurred this week, including the release of new true wireless earbuds from a budget audio brand and Tupperware's introduction of its first-ever glass food storage containers.

articles.title: Eva NYC's Freshen Up Invisible Dry Shampoo in Light & Fresh Is The Secret to Skipping Wash Day
articles.author: Allure Editors
articles.summary: Eva NYC launched Freshen Up Invisible Dry Shampoo in Light & Fresh. The product is a lightweight formula that absorbs excess oil without residue, providing a refreshed and natural feel. It is also part of the Allure Beauty Box product lineup for September.

articles.title: Samsung may bring first tri-fold phone to US this year: Report
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: Samsung is considering launching its "tri-fold" smartphone in the US later this year, a device with a larger display than current foldables. This move aims to differentiate Samsung from rivals, especially as Apple prepares to launch its iPhone Air. Minseok Kang, Samsung’s global head of smartphone product planning, stated that the 2025 launch timeline is on track.

articles.title: Suzuki Fronx hits the mark nicely
articles.summary: Suzuki launched the Fronx, a new compact crossover, which sold out its initial batch of 300 vehicles quickly at an introductory price of $29,990. The Fronx features a 1.5-litre engine with a mild-hybrid electric system and is equipped with keyless entry, dual-zone climate control, a 9.0-inch touchscreen, and various safety features like adaptive cruise control and lane-keeping assist.

articles.title: Top 10 AI-First CX Trends to Lead in 2026
articles.summary: NiCE is hosting a webinar on October 22nd, revealing the Top 10 AI-first trends reshaping customer service in 2026. The webinar will spotlight AI agents, experience memory, and orchestration to provide faster and more personal service.

articles.title: GoPuff updates website; here's what GoPuff shoppers in NJ can expect after changes
articles.author: Damon C. Williams
articles.summary: GoPuff has upgraded its website to attract younger shoppers with personalized experiences, real-time order updates, and a streamlined interface. The updated website includes features such as live video feeds from micro-fulfillment centers, real-time inventory snapshots, improved delivery tracking, and multilingual support, making it easier for shoppers to browse over 5,000 items.

articles.title: Aldi fans race to supermarket for £1.99 'gold dust' product that's back in stock
articles.author: Zahna Eklund
articles.summary: Aldi is reintroducing kiwi berries to its stores, priced at £1.99 (or £1.89 online). The company announced the return via TikTok video, prompting shoppers to visit their local Aldi to purchase the product. The kiwi berries are described as a 'new' addition and are expected to sell out quickly.

articles.title: NONA launches as the PH' first home GPT
articles.summary: Noneaway has launched NONA, the Philippines' first Home GPT, an AI-powered concierge designed to simplify the home journey. NONA provides end-to-end AI partnership covering property search, repair coordination, cleaning management, and furnishing suggestions. The launch event was hosted by Crystal Lee Gonzalez, CEO of Noneaway, and included strategic alliances with developers like Shang Properties and Ayala Land.

articles.title: Mark Zuckerberg's live AI demo of Meta's smart glasses fails—twice—as crowd laughs
articles.author: Rebekah Harding
articles.summary: During Meta Connect 2025, Meta's live demonstration of its Meta AI failed. The AI could not accurately guide a user in making a Korean-inspired steak sauce, providing incorrect and repeated suggestions, resulting in an unsuccessful product demo.

articles.title: Nike to Release New Air Jordan 3 Retro ‘El Vuelo' Sneakers: Here's Where to Get ...
articles.author: Rollingstone
articles.summary: Sneakers, originally released in 1988, are being re-introduced with a new colorway for global fans.

articles.title: Saint Agnes Soaps and Apparel launches in Trenton
articles.author: Postmedia Staff
articles.summary: Saint Agnes Soaps & Apparel has launched in Quinte West, specializing in handcrafted soaps made with natural Canadian ingredients and imported ladieswear. The business also offers British teas, treats, and a personalized shopping service, with both an online store and in-person visits available.

articles.title: Second Spin Thrift opens its doors in Quinte West
articles.author: Postmedia Staff
articles.summary: Darryl McCaw founded Second Spin Thrift in Quinte West, offering quality used clothing and household goods. The store aims to provide affordable options, promote sustainability, and support the local community by reducing textile waste. Second Spin Thrift is located at 390 Sidney St. Trenton and is open seven days a week.

articles.title: Ai+ Smartphone Reveals Festive Prices for Flipkart Big Billion Days
articles.author: ANI
articles.summary: Ai+ Smartphone is offering special festive pricing during Flipkart Big Billion Days. The Ai+ Pulse (4G) will be available for Rs. 4,499, and the Ai+ Nova (5G) will be priced at Rs. 6,999. Early access to these prices begins on September 22 for Flipkart Plus and Black members.

articles.title: LambdaTest Leads with First-to-Market Support for iPhone 17 Series on Real Devices
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: LambdaTest has made the iPhone 17 Series, including the iPhone 17, iPhone 17 Pro, iPhone 17 Pro Max, and the iPhone Air, immediately available on its Real Devices Platform. This addition allows developers to perform comprehensive cross-device and cross-OS testing at scale, ensuring thorough testing of mobile apps across various real-world environments. LambdaTest's platform now supports testing across 10,000+ real devices and integrates with 40+ testing tools.

articles.title: LambdaTest Leads with First-to-Market Support for iPhone 17 Series on Real Devices
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: LambdaTest has announced the immediate availability of the iPhone 17 Series on its Real Devices Platform. This includes the iPhone 17, iPhone 17 Pro, iPhone 17 Pro Max, and the iPhone Air. This addition enhances LambdaTest's real device cloud, enabling comprehensive cross-device and cross-OS testing at scale.

articles.title: Urban Legend's demise: self-fulfilling prophecy or cautionary tale?
articles.author: Adam Leyland
articles.summary: Urban Legend, a low-calorie doughnut brand startup, failed despite significant investment. The company attempted to compete with established brands like Krispy Kreme and Dunkin' by delivering fresh doughnuts to Tesco and Sainsbury's stores. Ultimately, the company's approach and product proposition were unsuccessful.

articles.title: Aldi customers told to 'run' to buy popular £1.99 item before it's gone for good
articles.author: Zahna Eklund
articles.summary: Aldi has re-introduced kiwi berries in their stores, priced at £1.99. The product is being marketed as a 'gold dust' item due to its anticipated high demand. Customers are encouraged to quickly purchase the product, described as a 'new' item, which is smaller than a traditional kiwi and can be eaten whole.

articles.title: Huawei Charts the Future of Smart Technology with Pioneering Product Lineup
articles.summary: Huawei is charting the future of smart technology. The company is introducing a pioneering product lineup.

articles.title: 33 Unique Products Worth Discovering
articles.author: Mallory Mower
articles.summary: Hal's New York Vanilla Cream Seltzer Water is introduced as a hydrating cream soda alternative. A stuffed waffle maker allows for cooking batter with various fillings. The Baseboard Buddy simplifies cleaning hard-to-reach areas. Cloning paste encourages new plant growth. Elephant Trax labels provide a visual inventory for packed items. A touchless vacuum eliminates the need for a dust pan. Lastly, Luigi's Sink and Drain Plunger helps prevent drain clogs.

articles.title: What Is ‘Stretchy Yogurt'? I Tried the Viral, 3-Ingredient Recipe
articles.author: Heather Martin
articles.summary: Mamie's is producing a unique stretchy yogurt. Lieu has also developed a stretchy yogurt recipe, with a focus on texture and flavor, creating a product that is both fun to eat and visually appealing. The yogurt recipes by Mamie's and Lieu are intended for launch or promotion.

articles.title: Home Bargains fans 'need' £3 alternative to beauty product that's £13 in Boots
articles.author: Amber O'Connor
articles.summary: Home Bargains has launched a new limited edition Sunkissed shower whip, retailing for £2.49. Additionally, Home Bargains offers discounts on La Roche Posay Toleriane Double Repair Mini Moisturiser now at £4.99 and The Beauty Crop Avocado Cleansing Balm now at £1.99.

articles.title: YoWash Laundromat Named 2025 Best of Florida Award Winner
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: YoWash Laundromat is recognized as a 2025 Best of Florida Award winner for its redefined modern laundromat experience. The company offers intuitive touch-screen washers and dryers, automatic doors, free Wi-Fi, and a laundry card payment system. Every cold wash includes complimentary ozone sanitizing, removing 99% of viruses and bacteria.

articles.title: Looking for a way to keep your floors sparkling without breaking the bank? This budget-friendly cordless mop sweeps, mops, and shines in MINUTES
articles.author: Julia Remillard
articles.summary: Teko introduces the Hover Scrubber Omni Electric Floor Mop, a cordless cleaning tool designed for various floor types. The product, which is available on QVC, is priced at $40 with the code HELLO20, marking a 44% discount from its typical price of $72. It includes a charger and two chenille microfiber pads and works with any cleaning formula.

articles.title: How Luminous Is Bringing Energy And Entertainment Together With Edge Go
articles.summary: Luminous Power Technologies has launched its Edge Go series, starting with the Luminous Edge Go 1500. This device is a portable energy solution that doubles as a Bluetooth speaker and karaoke machine, designed to charge phones, laptops, and accessories while also providing entertainment. The Edge Go aims to bridge energy reliability with everyday experiences for a new generation of consumers.

articles.title: Meta launches smart glasses with built-in display, reaching for ‘superintelligence'
articles.author: West Hawaii Today
articles.summary: Meta Platforms launched its first consumer-ready smart glasses on Wednesday. This marks the introduction of a new product in the consumer electronics market.

articles.title: adidas Basketball Unveils Harden Vol 9 'Flamingo Pink'
articles.author: The Source
articles.summary: Adidas Basketball introduced the Harden Vol 9 'Flamingo Pink.' This is the newest addition to James Harden's signature shoe line, marking the launch of a new colorway for the product.

articles.title: No7's beauty advent calendars are packed with products for mature skin – here's my review
articles.author: Sabine Wiesel
articles.summary: No7 has launched two beauty advent calendars: the 'No7 25 days of beauty advent calendar' priced at £60 and the 'No7 ultimate beauty advent calendar' at £175. The latter contains 25 full-sized products with a total worth of over £530 and includes items from No7's pro artist range, focusing on anti-ageing skincare.

articles.title: Notion rides AI boom to $500 million in annual revenue, but Microsoft competition looms
articles.author: Jordan Novet
articles.summary: Notion launched Notion AI, an artificial intelligence feature designed as a writing assistant, two weeks before the public release of ChatGPT. Notion AI helps users with brainstorming, editing, and summarizing.

articles.title: 39 Products You're About To Fall In Love With
articles.author: Kayla Boyd
articles.summary: EOS is launching a Crème de Pistachio Body Lotion, a non-greasy 24-hour moisturizer. Dr Teal's introduces a limited edition "Cozy Vanilla Season" Epsom salt magnesium soak. Gold Bond releases a firming neck and chest cream formulated with salicylic acid and hyaluronic acid.

articles.title: What Wyclef Jean Can't Live Without
articles.author: Wyclef Jean
articles.summary: Wyclef Jean discusses his preferred products and equipment. He uses Bustelo coffee, the Apollo Twin for recording vocals, Genelecs speakers for accurate sound, Logic Pro for quick recording, a Fender Stratocaster for soulful guitar playing, Ray-Bans sunglasses, a Steinway piano for songwriting, and Harley-Davidson choppers. These products influence his lifestyle and creative process.

articles.title: The iPhone 17 Pro hits UK stock and these are my favourite deals to get ...
articles.author: Daily Record
articles.summary: Apple's iPhone 17 series has been released today, with unspecified deals being offered.

articles.title: This Reddit user made an image to compare iPhone sizing – the results show why slim phones aren't all they seem
articles.summary: Apple launched its iPhone 17 range, featuring the iPhone Air with a 5.64mm depth. Samsung debuted its Galaxy S25 Edge earlier this year with a 5.8mm thickness. The article analyzes the design and thickness of these new phone models.

articles.title: Ai+ Smartphone Reveals Festive Prices for Flipkart Big Billion Days
articles.summary: Ai+ Smartphone announced special festive pricing for its Ai+ Pulse (4G) and Ai+ Nova (5G) models during Flipkart Big Billion Days. The Ai+ Pulse (4G) will be priced at Rs. 4,499, while the Ai+ Nova (5G) will retail at Rs. 6,999, with early access for Flipkart Plus members starting September 23.

articles.title: Walmart outlines major changes to online shopping
articles.author: Hugh Cameron
articles.summary: Walmart is enhancing its Walmart Translation Platform (WTP) to improve online shopping for non-English speakers. The updated platform, which uses AI and human linguists, now covers the entire catalog and offers more accurate translations. The new WTP has also delivered significant cost savings.

articles.title: 42 Products That Work So Well, Reviewers Call Them 'Wizardry,' 'Sorcery' Or Just Plain 'Magic'
articles.author: Maitland Quitmeyer
articles.summary: The Tineco vacuum/mop features motorized wheels for easy maneuvering and excels at picking up various messes like dust, fur, and crumbs. Users report that it requires frequent self-cleaning due to its efficiency in collecting debris, but they appreciate its ease of use and cleaning power.

articles.title: Mary Kay is applying AI: North Texas brand uses tech to simplify makeup choices
articles.author: Brian Womack
articles.summary: Mary Kay has launched a new AI-powered digital service called 'AI Foundation Finder' to help users select their ideal foundation shade. The service uses AI to scan 150 facial points to determine facial hues and match the best shade for the customer, offering over 50 shades in two finishes. This launch aims to appeal to younger, digitally-savvy makeup users.

articles.title: #128: Genesis Motor America Case Study
articles.author: Quo Vadis
articles.summary: Genesis Motor America is working on a growth strategy to increase brand awareness and capture market share. As part of their marketing analysis, the case study explores using Amazon Retail Media to target potential customers, specifically highlighting the Genesis GV80 Luxury SUV.

articles.title: This handheld vacuum cleaner costs less than £50 and is a saviour for quick spills
articles.author: Emily Peck
articles.summary: The Beldray Airlite Cordless Handheld Vacuum is a budget-friendly option designed for cleaning small areas. Priced under £50, it offers 25 minutes of use on a full charge and includes two attachments and a charging station. It is suitable for cleaning surfaces like tabletops and sofas.

articles.title: Smart glasses and unlocking ‘superintelligence'
articles.author: Wilson
articles.summary: Meta launched its new AI-powered smart glasses, the Meta Ray-Ban Display glasses, on September 30th in the US, with a UK launch planned for early next year, priced at $799. These glasses, which connect to Meta AI, enable users to perform everyday tasks such as taking photos, following recipes, and responding to messages, all without using a smartphone.

articles.title: I tried toilet paper from Aldi, M&S and 6 more shops - the best was a 50p roll
articles.author: Angela Patrone
articles.summary: Supermarkets such as Aldi, Asda, Tesco, Sainsbury's, Morrisons, Waitrose and M&S have launched their own brands of toilet paper. M&S's toilet paper is softer and thicker than Andrex, while Asda's toilet paper offers excellent value at £1.38.

articles.title: 56 Products That'll Make Your Home So Neat And Tidy, You'll Want To Invite People Over
articles.author: Maitland Quitmeyer
articles.summary: Levoit introduced a compact air purifier with HEPA filter and smart controls. Dawn Powerwash is described as a magical spray-on dish soap for tough grease. Tineco launched a 2-in-1 cordless vacuum and mop for cleaning hard floors.

articles.title: I asked ChatGPT to find me the best beauty dupes – it saved me £1.1K and found a £14 buy that banishes winter dry skin
articles.author: Abigail Wilson
articles.summary: ChatGPT was used to find affordable beauty product alternatives. As a result, more affordable alternatives to Giorgio Armani Luminous Silk foundation, Charlotte Tilbury Hollywood Flawless Filter, Sisley Phyto-Touche Illusion D'Été bronzer, Dior Backstage Rosy Glow Blush, Benefit BadGal Bang! Volumizing Mascara, Tom Ford Liquid Lip Luxe Matte, Bobbi Brown Extra Plump Lip Serum, Charlotte Tilbury Airbrush Flawless Finish Setting Spray, Tatcha The Water Cream, Guerlain Orchidée Impériale Mask, Augustinus Bader The Serum, and Baccarat Rouge 540 Eau de Parfum have been found.

articles.title: I asked ChatGPT to find me the best beauty dupes – it saved me £1.1K and found a £14 buy that banishes winter dry skin
articles.author: Abigail Wilson
articles.summary: The article presents affordable beauty product alternatives ('dupes') to luxury brands, discovered using ChatGPT. These include e.l.f. Power Grip Primer as a dupe for Milk Makeup Hydro Grip Primer, L'Oréal True Match Liquid Foundation as a dupe for Giorgio Armani Luminous Silk, and W7 Lumina Multi-Glow Filter as a dupe for Charlotte Tilbury Hollywood Flawless Filter. The article covers a range of product categories, including primer, foundation, glow products, and more.

articles.title: These Quince Bath Towels Fit My Plus-Size Frame
articles.author: Shea Simmons
articles.summary: Quince is promoting its oversized bath sheets, which are larger than standard towels, made from Turkish cotton, and known for their softness and absorbency. The bath sheets are designed to comfortably fit plus-size individuals and maintain their plush feel even after multiple washes. Besides bath sheets, Quince provides turkish ribbed quick dry bath towel, turkish waffle terry bath sheet bundle, and turkish cotton bath mat bundle.

articles.title: 5 Bottles That Whisky Experts Choose Over Glenfiddich 12 Year Old
articles.author: Mark Littler
articles.summary: Nc'Nean Organic Single Malt is introduced as a light, fruity, and sustainable alternative to Glenfiddich 12 Year Old. Askeim 8 Year Old, a Swedish whisky made with heritage barley, is also suggested. The Glen Grant 12 Year Old, reintroduced in 2016, is presented as a Speyside option with a sherry influence.

articles.title: 7 First Aid Beauty Products You'll Try Once And Love
articles.author: Becca Glasser-Baker
articles.summary: The article introduces several skincare products, including a body scrub with glycolic and lactic acids, an ultra repair cream intense hydration, a fragrance-free face cleanser, a serum-like sunscreen milk with SPF 45, a retinol eye cream, Bronze + Glow Drops with niacinamide, and a post-shower body oil. Each product is highlighted for specific benefits like exfoliation, hydration, sun protection, and enhancing skin tone, with corresponding prices provided.

articles.title: Car review: Xpeng G6 facelift exceeds expectations
articles.author: Lee Nian Tjoe
articles.summary: Xpeng has launched an upgraded version of its G6 electric SUV, featuring enhanced power, a new cabin design, and tweaked chassis. The G6 Performance variant boasts 70% more power than the standard model, achieving 0-100kmh in 4.1 seconds. The updated model also includes improvements to the charging technology, with DC charging speed now maxing out at 451kW.

articles.title: StarterPilot: AI Tool for Business Launch
articles.author: Mazi
articles.summary: StarterPilot, an AI-driven platform, introduces a suite of tools designed to streamline the process of turning ideas into ventures. The platform offers features for idea validation, branding with an AI name and icon generator, and a landing page builder to facilitate a swift business launch.

articles.title: Kay Beauty marks a milestone with Space NK debut
articles.author: Adgully Bureau
articles.summary: Kay Beauty, co-founded by Katrina Kaif and Nykaa, launched in the UK at Space NK stores and online, achieving number one in Space NK Online Search Terms. Early sales outperformed projected forecasts by double digits, with the lip category leading in sales. Kay Beauty's UK launch signifies Nykaa's aim to globalize Indian beauty brands.

articles.title: The Best Laundry Detergents That Won't Irritate Your Skin
articles.summary: It's So Pure Eco-Friendly Washing Detergent, made with plant and ion-based ingredients, is introduced as a safe detergent for adults and children, formulated without harsh chemicals. Chicco Baby Laundry Detergent is also presented as a gentle option for delicate fabrics and sensitive skin, effectively balancing stain removal and softness.

articles.title: Mark Zuckerberg Embarrassed On Stage During Smart Glasses Launch, Audience Laughs At Meta CEO, Here's What Happened
articles.author: Zubair Amin
articles.summary: Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg introduced a new $799 version of Meta's Ray-Ban smart glasses, featuring a tiny display and AI capabilities. During a demo, the glasses were tested by a food content creator to create a Korean-inspired steak sauce with guidance from the glasses.

articles.title: البانیہ میں مصنوعی ذہانت سے تیار کی گئی دنیا کی پہلی وزیر کا پارلیمنٹ میں پہلا خطاب
articles.summary: MaterialsZone has launched its AI-Guided Product Development feature, providing users with AI-generated experiment suggestions to streamline development cycles. This feature empowers researchers with real-time experiment recommendations, guiding them through iterative improvements and accelerating progress toward product requirements.

articles.title: Dreame Robot Vacuum Reduced by 25% - Keep Your Home Sparkling Without Breaking the Bank
articles.author: Echo Whats On
articles.summary: Dreame is offering a 25% discount on its D9 Max Gen 2 robot vacuum, now priced at £149. The vacuum features a 6,000 Pa suction power, a 570 ml dust box, smart mapping capabilities, and a built-in mop with a 235 ml water tank. Dyson has also reduced the price of its V8 Advanced cordless vacuum to £299.99. Also on offer is the Shark Classic Anti Hair Wrap Upright Pet Vacuum, now priced at £199.99.

articles.title: Hoverpen Interstellar by Novium Wins Platinum in A' Art Supply Awards
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Novium has launched Hoverpen Interstellar, an innovative levitating pen designed by Kuo-Hung Liang and Ming-Wei Kuo. The pen features levitation technology, a 23.5-degree angle, and is crafted from aircraft-grade aluminum with a neodymium magnet system. Hoverpen Interstellar won the Platinum A' Design Award in the Art and Stationery Supplies Design category.

articles.title: China's Xiaomi to remotely fix assisted driving flaw in 110,000 SU7 cars
articles.author: Afp Afp
articles.summary: A consumer electronics and smartphone company launched the SU7, an electric vehicle, in March 2024. This launch represents the company's entry into China's competitive EV market.

articles.title: Meet Samsung Galaxy S25 FE: The Gateway to the Galaxy AI and Flagship Essentials
articles.author: Al Bawaba
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics Co., Ltd. announced the Galaxy S25 FE.

articles.title: Amazon launches new AI creative partner in ads console
articles.summary: Amazon's automated ads are now fully automated and are available across various Amazon platforms. These platforms include Sponsored Brands, Sponsored Display, Brand Stores, and Amazon DSP.

articles.title: NoviqTech Launches Quantum Intelligence Beta Products to Drive Enterprise Adoption
articles.author: Nik Hill
articles.summary: NoviqTech, through its subsidiary Quantum Intelligence, has launched the beta versions of two new platforms: QI Provenance and QI AI. QI Provenance is a subscription platform giving businesses the ability to issue something, marking NoviqTech's first commercial delivery since July.

articles.title: OMA Launches in Dubai with Pledge to Bring Accountability Back to Digital Marketing
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Outsourced Marketing Agency FZCO (OMA) has officially launched its full operations in Dubai. OMA offers digital marketing services including pay per click (PPC) campaigns on Google and Meta, fast, mobile-first web design, and comprehensive end to end analytics. The agency focuses on serving a wide range of industries including healthcare, hospitality, retail, e-commerce, professional services, and local businesses.

articles.title: LT Elevator IPO listing on Friday; GMP robust after strong subscription
articles.author: ETMarkets.com
articles.summary: LT Elevator launched its IPO on the BSE SME platform, offering elevators and smart parking solutions through its subsidiary Park Smart Solutions. The IPO was subscribed 182.95 times overall. The company manufactures, installs, and maintains various elevator systems and also provides EPC and O&M services.

articles.title: Siddhi Cotspin IPO opens for subscription. Check GMP, price band and other details
articles.author: ETMarkets.com
articles.summary: Siddhi Cotspin is launching its IPO for subscription, valued at Rs 69.85 crore, including a fresh issue of shares and an offer for sale. The company manufactures and sells a variety of cotton yarns and plans to use the IPO proceeds for working capital, debt repayment, and general corporate purposes.

articles.title: Huawei offers free device 'premium care' with new service upgrade program
articles.summary: HUAWEI is launching its Service Upgrade Program in 2025, offering premium after-sales services to users free of charge. This program includes expert consultation, device diagnosis, cleaning and refresh services, and system renewal, covering a wide range of HUAWEI devices like smartphones, wearables, laptops, tablets, and audio products.

articles.title: YXT.com (NASDAQ:YXT) Unveils Intelligent Productivity Portfolio at Beijing Launch Event
articles.author: info@kalkinemedia.com
articles.summary: YXT.com hosted its Intelligent Productivity Product Launch in Beijing on September 17, 2025. Four flagship AI-enabled enterprise products were introduced, targeting HR transformation, role capability, sales enablement, and employee learning.

articles.title: Artificial intelligence (AI) startup Waddle announced on the 19th that it has officially launched an..
articles.author: A Prescription
articles.summary: AI startup Waddle launched its interactive AI agent 'Gentoo' on the NHN Commerce App Store. Gentoo is a B2B SaaS solution that recommends customized products to online shopping mall customers by understanding intentions with natural conversations. Companies using NHN Commerce's 'Godomall' can install Gentoo and experience it for 14 days for free.

articles.title: DreamCloud Mattress Sale: Save Up To 65% On Mattresses, Bundle Sets And More
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: DreamCloud is offering a mattress sale where customers can save hundreds on new beds or bedding bundles, including mattresses, bases, and sheet sets.

articles.title: AI is redefining marketing: Inside Epsilonâs playbook
articles.summary: Epsilon's PeopleCloud platform utilizes AI to focus on high propensity leads in real time for a Fortune 500 auto insurer. This resulted in a 17% reduction in cost-per-lead and generated 2.2 million auto policy coverage requests, leading to stronger conversions and higher ROI for the client.

articles.title: Renovatio Bioscience named finalist in Australia's NSW Export Awards 2025
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Renovatio Bioscience, recognized for its antioxidant-rich products, expanded its reach by launching its product line in the United States under the brand name Vincent in 2025. The company's product range includes supplements, skincare, and pantry staples, all derived from Australian apples.

articles.title: 34 Products To Make You Feel Like You Have Superpowers
articles.author: Melanie Aman
articles.summary: The content introduces a range of new products including a WD-40 pen for precise lubrication, Bissell Little Green machine for cleaning pet messes, and a Scumbug for pool cleaning. Several other products are described such as cleaning K-Cups, dishwasher cleaning tablets, washing machine cleaning tablets, carborundum sponges, etc. and target personal care and home maintenance needs, offering new solutions for everyday problems.

articles.title: 微软Win11全屏游戏模式提前泄露！所有Win11掌机都能用上_手机网易网
articles.author: 快科技
articles.summary: Microsoft and ASUS's ROG Xbox Ally was initially planned to have an exclusive full-screen Xbox experience. However, this feature has been leaked and can now be installed on any Windows 11 handheld device. The new Xbox experience mode integrates games from platforms like Steam, Epic Games, and Battle.net into a single interface.

articles.title: 27 Home Items Amazon Customers Are Loving September 2025
articles.author: Ashley Schumacher
articles.summary: Amazon features a list of trending home products called "Movers and Shakers."  These include items like artificial fall flowers ($17.99+), rolling garment racks ($36.99+), microwave splatter covers ($6.99+), and BrüMate Era stainless-steel tumblers ($39.99+), highlighting both functionality and style.

articles.title: ‘The American dream is the Midwest': LaunchKC powers next generation of startup job creators
articles.author: Haines Eason
org: Economic Development Corporation of Kansas City
articles.summary: SourceEazy is launching a technology that combines elements of Shopify, Alibaba and Custom Ink, streamlining the $170 billion global branded merchandise market. SourceEazy won a LaunchKC grant in 2024. LaunchKC has the unveiling of a cohort of entrepreneurs during Global Entrepreneurship Week-Kansas City in November.

articles.title: Beauty brand's major announcement sends shoppers wild over 'genius' offer: 'OMG this is so smart'
articles.author: ANDREA ROBERTSON
articles.summary: ghd launched its new straighteners, the chronos and chronos max, with a limited-time trade-in offer where customers can receive $150 back when they trade in any old hair straightener. The chronos straightener features HD motion-responsive technology and delivers up to 90 per cent more shine, reduces frizz, and produces straighter hair in one stroke, while the chronos max features wide plates for taming and styling more hair.

articles.title: This Eufy All-in-One Robot Vacuum/Mop Is $350 Off Right Now
articles.author: Pradershika Sharma
articles.summary: The Eufy X10 Pro Omni is now available on Amazon for $549.99, significantly reduced from its list price of $899.99. It's marketed as an all-in-one cleaning machine.

articles.title: 32 Handy Products For When It's Time To Clean Your House
articles.author: Lily Burrill
articles.summary: Several new cleaning products are introduced: Bar Keepers Friend cleansing powder for various surfaces, EasyWring microfiber spin mop for floors, Affresh dishwasher tablets, Wet & Forget cleaner for showers and tubs, and robot vacuum for floors.  Additionally, there's a jetted tub cleaner, Baseboard Buddy for baseboards, Bioclean hard water stain remover, Cerama-Bryte cooktop cleaning kit, Easy-Off fume-free oven cleaner, three-part microfiber blind wand, Clorox toilet cleaning kit, reusable pumice stone, slim cleaning brush, THE Pink Stuff, cleaning brush attachments, professional-strength grout cleaner, adjustable pet hair broom, touchless stationary vacuum, portable steamer, Grandma's Secret stain remover, pet urine stain remover, Angry Mama microwave cleaner, ChomChom roller lint remover, Bissell Little Green Multi-Purpose Cleaner, Magic Erasers, broom and dustpan set, Tineco 2-in-1 cordless vacuum and mop, screen-cleaning brush, Wine Away stain remover, and Microfiber cleaning cloths.

articles.title: In the Netherlands, if you use a dryer and an integrated washing dryer following Samsung Electronics..
articles.author: A Broadcasting Fan
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics has partnered with CoolBlue Energy in the Netherlands to offer free electricity to customers using Samsung washing machines, dryers, and integrated washing dryers between 12 p.m. and 3 p.m. This initiative, enabled by Samsung's SmartThings AI platform, encourages the use of Samsung's appliances during peak renewable energy production hours, promoting sustainable energy consumption and providing financial benefits to consumers.

articles.title: This Cordless Vacuum Cleaner Is $90 for Prime Members
articles.author: Rylee Johnston
articles.summary: Trucozie Cordless Vacuum Cleaner is on sale for $90 for Prime members, featuring a lightweight design, powerful suction, built-in light, and a 45-minute battery life.  The vacuum can also convert into a handheld vacuum. Cordless vacuum cleaners from Levoit, Jellypig, Lirios and Uninell are also available.

articles.title: Conformal coating by new film coat valve & nozzle of Shimada Appli. - 最新コーティング方案を発信するShimada Appli（シマダアプリ）→High T.E. spray
articles.author: shimada7703
articles.summary: Shimada Appli introduces a new film coat valve and nozzle. The nozzle is called FSCC06 Micro Spray (Swirl).

articles.title: Amazon to soon launch big offer for frustrated internet customers
articles.author: Patricia Battle
articles.summary: Amazon is planning to launch a new internet service, Project Kuiper, for consumers dissatisfied with their current providers. The service utilizes low-Earth-orbit satellites.

articles.title: Leighton Meester is named as Bubble's latest ambassador - after the brand cracked Priceline's Top 10 in under a year
articles.author: Sophie Haslett
articles.summary: Bubble Skincare launched its first 360 brand campaign, Radical Joy, and announced Leighton Meester as its global brand ambassador. Leighton Meester's skincare regime includes Soft Launch Hydrating Cream Cleanser, Cosmic Silk Hydrating Milky Toner, Day Dream Tone & Texture Serum, Slam Dunk Hydrating Moisturiser, and Talk Back Lip Serum. Bubble Skincare also launched Power Wave Super Hydrating Cream Moisturiser in Priceline in June.

articles.title: ‘The new UI is borderline unusable': Netflix subscribers are still complaining about the app re-design, ...
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Netflix is under scrutiny for changes to its service, prompting an evaluation of whether the 'new' version meets user expectations.

articles.title: Need a Hair Makeover Announces Franchise Launch Following National Award Successes
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: Need a Hair Makeover, a UK-based salon brand, has launched its official Franchise Opportunity. The company plans to open three new locations by Q1 2026. Franchise enquiries are now open.

articles.title: Evaluations As A North Star For AI Companies
articles.author: Sebastian Crossa
articles.summary: ZeroEval, a platform founded by Sebastian Crossa, has launched to measure and optimize the quality of AI agents. The platform aims to provide reliable benchmarks and evaluations to help companies establish robust evaluation frameworks, ensuring AI product quality and business success in customer service, financial decisions, and mission-critical operations.

articles.title: Get a FREE Chromebook with Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge from iD Mobile – here's how ...
articles.author: The Sun
articles.summary: Samsung's Galaxy S25 Edge is now available on iD Mobile for £29.99 per month with 500GB of data, plus a £49 upfront cost. This pay-monthly deal offers competitive value for the new Android device.

articles.title: The Story Behind the LightCube Movement: From 0 to 600K Gen-Z Members
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: LightCube was launched a year ago targeting Gen Z. The product aims to provide clarity and actionable depth, addressing the need for a less noisy online experience for the generation.

articles.title: Weekend wishlist: 9 shopping picks from River Island, Charlotte Tilbury and more
articles.author: The Mirror
articles.summary: River Island, H&M, Lush, and Glossier are among the companies whose products are being recommended and considered for purchase. These items represent additions being made to shopping baskets, suggesting current product promotions or new product features within these brands.

articles.title: Google Gemini AI Nano Banana Prompts: Age Progression To 3D Statue, Try These Five Prompts ...
articles.author: NDTV
articles.summary: Google's Gemini Nano AI model introduces new 'Banana AI' prompts, enabling users to apply trending effects to their photos for sharing with family and friends. This feature allows for a fresh touch to photos based on viral trends.

articles.title: Haier Appliances Expects Up To 30% Growth In Festive Season Post GST Cut
articles.author: NDTV
articles.summary: Haier India is planning new product launches to attract customers during the festive season. The company is also investing in a marketing and branding campaign to support these launches.

articles.title: Incredibuild Unveils State-of-the-Art AI Platform to Accelerate the Entire Software Development Lifecycle
articles.author: system
articles.summary: A new platform provides customers with real-time build intelligence. This intelligence is designed to feed and accelerate AI-driven product development processes.

articles.title: Don't Get Too Excited for That Nvidia and Intel Chip Just Yet
articles.author: Gizmodo
articles.summary: Intel and Nvidia are promising a new age of mobile gaming. However, there are reasons to be cautious about these promises.

articles.title: InventHelp Inventor Develops Improved Toilet Brush (LJD-500)
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: An inventor from Ridge, N.Y. has invented the YAHNIQUE BRUSH. This product is designed as a safe, convenient, and sanitary alternative to conventional toilet bowl brushes for cleaning under the rim of a toilet.

articles.title: Here's How You Can Get the New iPhone 17 Pro for Free at T-Mobile
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: Apple is offering a trade-in program where customers can exchange their old phones, regardless of condition, for the upcoming iPhone 17 Pro at no cost. This promotion suggests the impending launch of the iPhone 17 Pro.

articles.title: Guest Opinion: America needs a real anti-establishment movement, by Ahmed Bouzid
articles.author: The Keene Sentinel
articles.summary: TechCorp has launched Aether, a new AI-powered personal assistant designed for proactive support and personalized recommendations. Pre-orders for Aether begin next week, with shipments planned for Q3. The device boasts industry-leading security features and aims to redefine daily interactions.

articles.title: HUAWEI Unveils WATCH GT 6 Series and New Suite of Innovative Products at Global Launch Event
articles.author: Al Bawaba
articles.summary: Huawei hosted an Innovative Product Launch event in Paris. They unveiled a new lineup of products at the event.

articles.title: ProPlaintiff.ai Launches Agentic AI Platform for Personal Injury Attorneys
articles.author: Nasdaq Globe Newswire
articles.summary: The V3 platform launches an AI Paralegal feature. It also introduces a redesigned demand letter generator. The platform offers deeper case intelligence as well.
